body_html:
@gunan @cancan101 @perone HI, I upgraded to tensorflow1.3 and now tensorflow couldn't find my GPU. I reckon it's due to CuDNN5.1. is this assumption true?
How can I upgrade CUDNN5 to CuDNN6 or 7? is it gonna work fine for tensorflow r1.3?
I was only able to download deb file for CuDNN6 and I'm wondering if I have to use the DEB or Pow DEB file. Also, can anybody guide in how to do this upgrade from CuDNN5 to 6 or 7..
Thanks
